semantics.label: Show title screen
semantics.description: If checked, a title screen will show up when starting.

fields.label: Background image
fields.description: Select an image to use as the background of the game map.

fields.label: Stage label
fields.description: This label will be displayed on top of your exercise and will help you to connect different stages with one another.

fields.label: User can start here
fields.description: If checked, this stage will be a stage that the user start at. If no stage or more than one stage can be the start stage, the starting stage will be chosen randomly.

fields.label: Time limit
fields.description: Define timer related settings.

fields.label: Time limit
fields.description: Optional time limit in seconds. If a user exceeds this time, the exercise will close, be reset, and the user will loose a life if lives are limited.

fields.label: Timeout warning time
fields.description: Optionally set when a timeout warning audio should be played (number of remaining seconds). An audio needs to be set in the audio settings.

fields.label: Access restrictions
fields.description: Define restrictions for unlocking.

fields.label: Minimum score to unlock
fields.description: The user will not be able to unlock this stage if he has not received at least this minimum score by completing other stages. Please note that this setting will have no effect if "free roaming" is set in the behavioural settings.

fields.label: Open once score sufficient
fields.description: If there has been an attempt to unlock the stage with insufficient score, should the stage unlock automatically once the score becomes sufficient.

fields.label: Stage content
fields.description: Choose the type of content you would like to add.

fields.label: Number of extra lives
fields.description: Set how many lives the user will get when entering this stage.

fields.label: Number of seconds of extra time
fields.description: Set how many seceonds the user will gain for the global time limit when entering this stage.

fields.label: Message (user not successful)
fields.placeholder: You did not make it this time ...

fields.label: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

fields.label: Display paths
fields.description: Choose whether paths will be displayed on the map. Please note: The paths are always visible in the editor.

fields.label: Animate map
fields.description: Decide if the map should be animated. Even if you set this option, the content type will honor the users' browser setting if they prefer reduced motion.

fields.label: Click on locked stage
fields.description: Will be played on the map when clicking on a locked stage.

fields.label: Check exercise (not full score)
fields.description: Will be played when an answer is checked and the user did not get full score.

fields.label: Check exercise (full score)
fields.description: Will be played when an answer is checked and the user did get full score.

fields.label: Unlocking a stage
fields.description: Will be played on the map when a stage gets unlocked.

fields.label: Open exercise
fields.description: Will be played when an exercise is opened.

fields.label: Close exercise
fields.description: Will be played when an exercise is opened.

fields.label: Show dialog
fields.description: Will be played when a confirmation dialog is shown.

fields.label: Full score
fields.description: Will be played when the user reaches full score for the map.

fields.label: Lost a life
fields.description: Will be played when the user loses a life.

fields.label: Gained life
fields.description: Will be played when the user gains a life.

fields.label: Game over
fields.description: Will be played when the game is over and the user cannot continue.

fields.label: Gained extra time
fields.description: Will be played when the user gains extra time.

fields.label: Timeout warning
fields.description: Will be played when the user is running out of time for an exercise.

fields.label: End screen (not full score)
fields.description: Will be played on the end screen if the user did not get full score.

fields.label: End screen (full score)
fields.description: Will be played on the end screen if the user did get full score.

fields.label: Lives
fields.description: Set the number of lives for a user or leave empty for unlimited lives. Users will lose a life when they do not get full score and they cannot continue once all lives are lost.

fields.label: Global time limit
fields.description: Optional time limit in seconds for the whole game. If a user exceeds this time, the game will be over immediately.

fields.label: Timeout warning time
fields.description: Optionally set when a timeout warning audio should be played (number of remaining seconds). An audio needs to be set in the audio settings.

fields.label: Finish score
fields.description: Optional score that can be lower than the summed maximum score of all exercises, so users can receive full score without completing all exercises.

fields.label: Show stage labels
fields.description: Choose whether a stage's label will be shown on hovering a stage with the mouse. The label will not show on touch devices.

fields.label: Roaming
fields.description: Choose whether users can roam all stages freely, need to finish a stage to get access to that stage's neighbors, or need to pass a stage to get access to that stage's neigbors.

fields.label: Visibility range
fields.description: Select how far the user can see ahead

options.label: See all unlocked stages and their adjacent neighbors

fields.label: Full score, but no lives left
fields.default: You have achieved full score, but lost all your lifes!

fields.label: Full score, but timed out
fields.default: You have achieved full score, but ran out of time!

fields.label: Dialog text finish map: General
fields.default: If you finish now, you will not be able to explore the map any longer.

fields.label: Dialog text finish map: Question
fields.default: Do you really want to finish the map?

fields.label: Dialog text access denied: General
fields.default: This stage requires you to meet some goals before it can be opened.

fields.label: Dialog text access denied: Minimum score
fields.description: @minscore is a placeholder and will be replaced with the respective value.
fields.default: You need at least a certain number of points: @minscore

fields.label: Dialog text game over
fields.default: You have lost all your lives. Please try again!

fields.label: Dialog text game over by timeout
fields.default: You have run out of time. Please try again!

fields.label: Dialog text time out (lost a life)
fields.default: You ran out of time and lost a life.

fields.label: Dialog text score incomplete (lost a life)
fields.default: You did not achieve full score and lost a life.

fields.label: Dialog text full score
fields.default: You have collected enough points to finish this map with a full score, but you are free to explore the rest if you wish to.

fields.label: Dialog text full score (amendment, if lives are set)
fields.default: But beware! You may still lose lives!

fields.label: No background image was set
fields.default: No background image was set for the map.

fields.label: No stages were set
fields.default: No valid stages were set for the map.

fields.label: Your result
fields.description: @score will be replaced by the number of points. @total will be replaced by the maximum possible points.

fields.label: Map was opened (solutions mode)
fields.default: The map was opened in solutions mode.

fields.label: Exercise label
fields.description: @stagelabel is a placeholder and will be replaced with the respective stage label.

fields.label: Stage button label
fields.description: @stagelabel is a placeholder and will be replaced with the respective stage label.

fields.label: adjacent stage label
fields.description: @stagelabelOrigin and @stagelabelNeighbor are placeholders and will be replaced with the respective stage labels.

fields.label: Description of map navigation
fields.default: Use space or enter key to activate current stage. Use arrow keys to select adjacent stage. Use space or enter key on adjacent stage to navigate there.

fields.label: Moved to stage
fields.description: @stagelabel is a placeholder and will be replaced with the respective stage label.

fields.label: Unlocked stage
fields.description: @stagelabel is a placeholder and will be replaced with the respective stage label.
